website_summaries.verdict: A spacious refrigerator from a trusted brand. If you're looking for something basic and large, this is a good deal.
pros: Glass shelving and clear bins enhance its spacious, clean look
cons: Ice maker is not included, but one could be installed

website_summaries.verdict: A good basic fridge at a great price.
pros: 18 cubic foot capacity provides a lot of space for food storage
Quick delivery and Amazon will take away your old fridge
Also comes in stainless steel and black
cons: Does not come with an ice maker, but one can be purchased separately

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Excellent Experience
customer_reviews.text: We love this refrigerator and we enjoyed receiving it by a local delivery team that was very knowledgeable and careful. Our old refrigerator was taken away, too, We will by large appliances from Amazon again in the future based on this experience alone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dustan

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic sales tactic
customer_reviews.text: Most of these reviews are for a different model. Don’t be fooled. I thought Amazon was a company that valued customers’ trust but look at them participating in such an obvious bait and switch. This is a listing for a specific model not a combined listing and yet the reviews cover several different models. Buyer beware. Our unit is a 60505 and it sucks. Cheap as they come fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Not Funny

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: this frig has worked at 85+ degrees and now down to 10 degrees in my non-temperature controlled garage. we are very happy with this purchase! a lot bigger than we anticipated but the size is totally appreciated. one of the best deals I ever made.
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive fridge
customer_reviews.text: Fridge is the proper size and seems to work perfectly. The only thing I might complain about is that the door doesn't always close on it's own. The guys who installed the fridge seemed professional and on time too
customer_reviews.author: Thirdbase

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Definatly check item before delivery drivers drive off. Scratches galore and a cracked shelf
customer_reviews.author: b butts

customer_reviews.title: Consumer reports Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Consumer reports gave it 61 points, which was good. All in the good or very good category like noise, efficiency, etc. At 400 some dollars, 2 day delivery, installation, unpacking, startup and old Fridge removal its 1/2 the cost of others. Super value. And consumer reports gave it the best rating for reliability. It's a fantastic buy. At 48 dollars a year to run, we leave in the garage, full time. Best Value.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Schurter

customer_reviews.title: Scratches inside and cracked door screws handle
customer_reviews.text: Delivered right on time but there were a few a black scratches in the inside freezer door shelf’s and inside the refrigerator there was few black scratches. Also all the way on the top on the freezer door the little cover that goes to hide the screws of opening and closing door, it’s cracked when the guys put it on. :( The only reason I’m complaining about it cuz it’s brand new and I expect it to be completely new not with scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Product review

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: The one negative thing I can say is that the snapping sound it makes when the self-defrost cuts in (at least that's what the manual says is making the sounds) can be quite annoying. I keep thinking there's a rodent running around in the kitchen cabinets. The refrigerator sits at the corner of the kitchen that adjoins the living room, so the sound is always very audible. Since the manual mentions it, I have to assume that the sound is normal for this unit. Other than that it seems like a really good refrigerator at an amazing price (referring to the 60509 model). Delivery went off without a hitch.
customer_reviews.author: F. Greenlee

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: When this fridge is not running, it's silent, of course, but when it is running, as it periodically does, it is always obvious and noticeable. I think it's a huge disservice not to let consumers know the dB of the fridges. All I had to go off were the reviews, which many people said this fridge is quiet. To me, it's not. So if you are a sensitive person to noise, hell yes, this fridge is loud. I almost returned it, but it seemed like such a hassle, especially when I have no way of knowing that a different fridge is any quieter. Lame sauce.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Just about every single one of the cheaply made plastic shelves have broken. The temperature control is a freaking joke. After having many items freeze in the refrigerator and ice crystals on everything in the freezer while having the temperature set at the recommended setting i have had it on 2 and even then things freeze in the freezer. I had a Kenmore that lasted 15 years without any problems. Pretty much the same type of refrigerator but this is lacking all the quality that apparently no longer exists.
customer_reviews.author: NaKaDy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap.  Works.  Not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is a great bargain, and it works, but it is not built well. Be VERY VERY careful if you attempt to move the handles to the other side -- take out the two screws for each handle, CAREFULLY rotate the handle to the side of the door, and SLIDE the handle horizontally along the face of the door in the direction opposite the screws. SWAP the handles when you replace them (freezer handle -> fridge handle, and vice versa). There is an EXTREMELY (deliberately) fragile, tiny, replaceable plastic fastener on the inside of the handle that you will almost certainly break. But don't worry, Kenmore will sell you a replacement part for $25.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Russell

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Ergonomic
customer_reviews.text: The previous 18 CU. FT. refrigerator died after 16 years so I went with the same model and stepped up to 21CU.FT. The space layout is ergonomic and easily adjustable. Temperature control is on the money. It rolls across the floor essily when loaded so that it is easy to clean the back and floor. Amazon needs to stop using stupid AI to composed th review questions because it asks me about the warmth of the refrigerator. I will let you know months from now about energy efficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Echosyn

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: There was a leak for freezer. Due to ice accumulation the refrigerator stopped working after 2weeks.
customer_reviews.author: DHANANJAY HANUMANTE

customer_reviews.title: Plastic door handle breaks easily.  No replacement parts not available
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy, cheap handle, replacement parts NOT available, incompatible with oem refrigerator door handles. The plastic refrigerator door handle broke. I called Kenmore/Sears and the human representative acted like a robot, weird. I asked if a replacement for part number 30120-0027200 was available, and the rep (repeatedly) pretended (it seems) as if I was schedule a repairman ($100 + parts & labor). I can replace the handle myself, just need the part. It seems this refrigerator is no longer supported and parts not available. I recommend you get a refrigerator from a non-sears (i.e. kenmore and several other brands) refrigerator
customer_reviews.author: Arya

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Appliance Delivery is EXEMPLARY
customer_reviews.text: I work for the corporate office of a large box store.... and Amazon is the shiz for appliances! I scheduled my delivery window when I bought it, they brought it downstairs, set it up, and did not leave a mess.... IN 10 MINUTES. The refrigerator is perfect for our basement apartment, and I got the protection plan.... no hassles at all with anything, it was so amazing that I told my director at work we need to do appliances the Amazon way. If you have reservations about buying an appliance on Amazon, I say let those go and just do it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Holden-Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Junky Appliance
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase a major appliance from amazon. The return window closed less than a month after purchase. When the entire freezer thawed all the food in it a few weeks after purchase (a couple hundred dollars from BJs), we chalked it up to us not setting it correctly. All we could do was turn the knob back and forth to hear the motor kick back in. And just now we just discovered that two months worth of stored breast milk is semi thawed and completely enraged/devastated. I’m done. That’s irreplaceable.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M

customer_reviews.title: Has been working well for us for almost two years now.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this November 2017. It has been working well for us for almost two years now. We had it delivered to our place in Wrightwood CA with no problem. The delivery guys called about a half hour beforehand, and showed up when they were supposed to. They brought the fridge in from the truck and set it up completely for us, and they were very courteous and friendly. We are very happy with our fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Josedude

customer_reviews.title: Good fridge!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace another, 10-year-old Kenmore refrigerator. One good thing for me is that this one does NOT have an ice maker. The other one did and I didn't use it, so it was in the way. The crisper drawers are smaller in this one and the extra "meat" drawer is not there. It will take a while for me to adjust to this one, but it is working perfectly. For the price, it's a good fridge and Amazon's delivery was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Large than expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Large than expected for the price. Glass shelves easy to clean. Large plastic bottom drawers keep veggies fresh. Freezer is large.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Rio

customer_reviews.title: A great second refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy! My old extra refrigerator was dying. I took a chance and ordered this one from Amazon after being an appliance store purchaser in the past. The delivery men set the fridge up and explained the features to my husband since I was not home. It is a good solid refrigerator- great seal as it is outside in Miami, FL. The price was so reasonable too. So glad that I purchased from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: mammainmiami

customer_reviews.title: buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Mediocre materials, could not be more basic, doesn't even have a leveling screw or foot. Cheap all around--and as has been mentioned-- if you read carefully, most of the more positive reviews are for the larger items, which clearly do not have the same features (or lack thereof) as the smaller one. Shame on amazon for not responding to that obvious dishonesty and correct the confusion for such a significant purchase. So far it works better than the broken refrigerator it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Robert  Becker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome, it came on time, the delivery was spot on and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Due to Covid most major retailers were quoting a wait time of 3 to 4 weeks for delivery of fridges. Ordered my fridge on line and got it in 3 days, outstanding. This fridge is doing what it was designed to do, no problems so far. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: B. D. Norman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great product and Awesome job with delivery and set up!
customer_reviews.author: Nosbush Dairy, LLP

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER, in my wildest imagination, would have thought to buy a refrigerator from Amazon without having seen it myself first. But I was in dire need of one, and Amazon was the one who could get it here the fastest. This is exactly what I wanted. I was able to get it installed and have my old one taken away. It works perfectly. And the insurance policy is perfect. This is our backup fridge in the basement, but when it is time for a new one upstairs, I will absolutely go to Amazon for shopping for it first. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: JKJ

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, delivery process was seamless
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, price was right and functioning as promised. the delivery/installation process through amazon was very smooth, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Nice Looking Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Our old fridge died, and this replacement worked in the limited space, with the advantage of being a little larger. So far, no complaints, it works well, and like the large shelves in the doors.This model does not have an ice-maker, which is as we wanted it. Nice and neat looking as well, and operates quietly.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Licht

customer_reviews.title: Fridge as Described and Very Nice Experience
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice, Great Price, only needed a couple of hours to be cold enough to use. Very Energy Efficient as well. Delivery service was excellent, delivered on time promised, gave us heads up when 30 minutes away, drivers were extremely careful with product. I inspected inspected as soon as was uncrated and also after setup, to make sure there was no damage prior to and after setup..Very Professional and Cordial. Whole process took less than 1/2 hr.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler 08

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this basic but roomy secondary garage refrigerator.Good price and very successful two day delivery. Plus they very polite deliverymen took away the old one for recycling. Would buy again and reccomend dealing with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: bjnr

customer_reviews.title: I like Kenmore products
customer_reviews.text: I like Kenmore products. I am very disappointed in the screw attachment of the handle. We watched the 3 men from our garage- they were at end of driveway putting together. All 3 worked on it. See see finished product
customer_reviews.author: Roro

customer_reviews.title: Gave it a try
customer_reviews.text: If you want something of quality look on. Probably a price point that is to low. Fits what I need right now but will be done with Kenmore. The setup wasn't as stellar as expected due to other reviews. On time, no bumps against anything on way in. Definitely experienced at moving appliances. Left shelves on interior unpacked and some bits of tape here and there. Asked about changing the hinge point on the door and said it was easy. Not big items but again expectations were high from glowing reviews of delivery service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust the freezer
customer_reviews.text: The freezer randomly stops working sometimes. Lost a lot of money to this freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Out of warranty and now BROKEN.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Kenmore 60502 on April 8th, 2018. It stopped cooling April 2020. The freezer still works, the refrigerator doesn't. The warranty lasts for one year. In fairness, the refrigerator worked well for almost two years. I've written Kenmore but have received no response. I would like for Kenmore or Amazon to address this product issue, and offer me something, as I am unable to purchase a new refrigerator every two years.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, Energy Efficient, Nice Inside, Farly Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Pretty for a plain model (high gloss). Energy efficient. Nice inside and roomy on the door. Fairly quiet. Drawers are average plastic and average size. Our space only fits up to this size model which are limited choices. Good pick and good price. Have feeling it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: ... apprehensive in ordering online but it's one of the best purchase decisions ever for my garage
customer_reviews.text: was a little apprehensive in ordering online but it's one of the best purchase decisions ever for my garage. The Fridge is very spacious and does it's job. Delivery was smooth and quick and enjoyed the overall experience!
customer_reviews.author: Sushar

customer_reviews.title: Fridge works okay. Just be sure to check refrigerator/freezer ...
customer_reviews.text: Fridge works okay. Just be sure to check refrigerator/freezer doors to make sure its closed. Sometimes when I think I've closed the fridge, it is still open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: OMG - I am so happy with this - all of the stores around us had an exact similar Fridge - but they were all on a 2 week wait - ordered this and it was delivered and put into place in our garage within 2 days. The deliver and set up was great - plus they took the old one with.
customer_reviews.author: RGrady

customer_reviews.title: It is a fine refrigerator with no light in the freezer.
customer_reviews.text: The delivery team was timely and efficient. They called to let me know they were coming in 20 minutes and they actually came in less than 20 minutes. The refrigerator works and is quiet. The freezer works fine, I just miss the light in the freezer but it is not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Cooper

customer_reviews.title: delivery was a real headache-
customer_reviews.text: finally got it delivered after moving most of my furniture way out of the way- and I measured, it was way farther than I had to move it- then amazon drops the price 50 bucks- and the "crisper" drawer doesn't work- so, all in all, I vote buy locally-
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great.
customer_reviews.text: It's cold, but not to where things freeze in the fridge, but the freezer is ice cold. works great.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Whitcomb

customer_reviews.title: No hauling away old fridge
customer_reviews.text: The fridge came in excellent condition and works really well for my rental property. My only complaint is that at the checkout section, there was no option for "haul-away" even though in the description specifically said "free optional haul-away of old appliance at checkout." So no, I have two fridges and have to pay more money for a junk guy to haul-away my old fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Neo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy !
customer_reviews.text: I made a mistake when ordering. Amazon cleared it up in minutes. Delivered right on time. Excellent delivery persons. Took away old refrigerator with no problem. Love this model. Actually too big for us, but comes in handy for parties.
customer_reviews.author: k.lehman

customer_reviews.title: Working refrigerator!
customer_reviews.text: This frig is completely adequate for my needs, although I was at first skeptical that it would be. It has a few less storage options than my previous frig, but I bought a few trays (one for cheese, one for condiments).
customer_reviews.author: Momcatati

customer_reviews.title: Good fridge for price
customer_reviews.text: Had a dent in freezer door not a big deal it’s just an extra fridge but kinda annoying. It is kind of loud seems to run all the time. Curious to see if it effect electric bill. Good amount of small for a smaller fridge. It was very inexpensive so all in all ok with the purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Skies Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not Cooling.
customer_reviews.text: The fridge made it 6 weeks in the garage before it stopped cooling. I bought this because it’s specifically supposed to be garage ready. Amazon is replacing it but I did loose my frozen food. I was really happy with it until it broke. Hopefully this one is just a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Karen

customer_reviews.title: Poor Lighting, but Overall Good Unit
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and good interior refrigerator. Lighting is non-existent in freezer and very dim in refrigerator. Used a motion detector small light with a lithium battery good to -50 degrees F in the freezer. That provides some lighting. Would have given the refrigerator a five-star except for the lights issue.
customer_reviews.author: cewats

customer_reviews.title: Won't be disappointed if it's a reasonable priced fridge you are looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice roomy fridge, quiet, with nice big vege bins and shelves. Freezer does what its supposed to do and there is plenty of room for that holiday turkey. This model does not have an icemaker but this was of no concern to me. This is a great size refrigerator for the money. L.E.D lighting makes for a well lit interior.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. The plastic covering is annoyingly hard to get off. Also, the main door handle broke in about a year.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Bradway

customer_reviews.title: Look at this when purchasing an appliance
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly what you would expect works great. Kenmore fridge never lets you down. First time I purchased an appliance through amazon. Delivery and set up were great and professional
customer_reviews.author: Don Hall

customer_reviews.title: Delivery Truck Driver was Difficult.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 140 condominium complex and deliveries can only be made in a certain area. I told the delivery truck driver where he had to park, but he insisted on parking where he wanted to - blocking cars entering and leaving our circle driveway. Other than that the delivery was completed with no more fuss. The refrigerator works fine.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. M.

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerator delivered with mouse at the back of it and was not delivered with a box
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered without the box/package and with a mice at the back of the panel. I woke up and found mouse dropping/feces around the refrigerator. I heard a crawling sound after it was delivered but i thought it was regular noise. I I am used to my refrigerator being delivered in its package while they unbox the package in front of me. But this was delivered without one and a mice in the unit at the back.
customer_reviews.author: comfort adegoke oladele

customer_reviews.title: Garage fridge.
customer_reviews.text: Ok pretty generic fridge, low expectations, but wish the magnet to close was stronger. The light and temp controls hang awkwardly low and keep whacking my hand on it. Delivery team was phenom though, super friendly and unwrapped and set it up for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Fridge for Basic Needs
customer_reviews.text: Edited: I had to send this fridge back after 8 months. The noise continued to get worse over time. Moved into a small apt and needed a fridge to fit a decent sized space. This product fit perfectly. Delivery was on time and no hassle. My only complaint is that it makes a small rattling noise every couple hours but it's something I can easily over look.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: It is not quiet
customer_reviews.text: It’s not an expensive refrigerator so you get what you pay for to some degree. But it is not quiet. You can easily hear it running and there are also some additional noises coming from it.
customer_reviews.author: stunned

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: an excelent fridge. very roomy . just what i need
customer_reviews.author: albert j. green

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This new refrigerator replaced one that was over 50 years old. The old one was on it's last legs - when I ordered this new Kenmore. I love the new refrigerator! It works great!! It has already reduced my electricity bill by a full 22% over last month!! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: David Veatch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For a medium-sized fridge, it's very spacious inside. Very happy with the product. Made the right decision on this Kenmore appliance. Make sure to get a top quality stainless steel cleaner that will resist fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: timothy barnett

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work; poor warranty service
customer_reviews.text: Problems with delivery. Then while the internal light turned on, we discovered the next day that it didn't cool or freeze. Poor customer service on warranty. We decided to return.
customer_reviews.author: Cornerstone Books

customer_reviews.title: This fridge is very good size for single family use
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for almost a year. This fridge is very good size for single family use.
customer_reviews.author: Shivani

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge awesome delivery
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. The fridge is great but the delivery was better. They were right on time, they were neat and fast. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: The fridge part is not cooling properly. It needs to be repaired.
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator is failing. The milk is spoiled less than 2 years after purchase. My husband failed to get the warranty registered so now we have to call Sears for a repair job. We bought the unit in Sept 2018. It's now Feb. 2020. I'm so frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was super easy. Professional workers and were quick and careful getting the refrigerator in. New fridge is exactly as described. We are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks like a refurbish one
customer_reviews.text: this refrigerator does not seem to be a new one, instead I think it is refurbish. another minus is that the compartments on the door does not hold tall items. I feel that I got screw with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay cold
customer_reviews.text: Since we got it this thing both the freezer and fridge have not stayed cold. We found things in the freezer were consistently not staying frozen and now the fridge cannot get below 50 deg despite being on the coldest setting. We threw away a bunch of food that spoiled because this fridge does not work. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Be wary of set up and haul away promise
customer_reviews.text: We picked this refrigerator because it was supposed to include installation and haul away. Neither of those was done. I had to call the delivery company to reschedule another 3 hour service window for them to pick up the old one and move this huge heavy one into the right place. It seemed simple that this supposed to be included in the order.
customer_reviews.author: David Harkins

customer_reviews.title: chill and spacious
customer_reviews.text: had it for 6 months in my garage now and very happy. excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: Ha26

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time or money in this refrigerator. Had nothing on bottom shelf and it completely shattered.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ciccone

customer_reviews.title: Great refrigerator for our Winter vacation villa
customer_reviews.text: Great refrigerator for our Winter vacation villa. Prompt delivery and haul away of our old one! Thank you Amazon for offering this great roomy refrigerator at an awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: Freezy

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product seems fine this is more of a slam on delivery service. Showed up nearly 3 hours later than window given and product is dented and missing hardware. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Service and quality...
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything... delivery,setup and haul away.. Nice machine and a great deal... I actually need another... will order soon,
customer_reviews.author: Steven R. Pagnano

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this refrigerator for SIX WEEKS and it started leaking water from the inside and molding the refrigerator. The repair technician said he has to drill a hole in the back to fix it and let wires hangout!!! We’re talking about a NEW REFRIGERATOR!!! That’s unacceptable!!! And the replacement process is basically impossible!!! BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Owned it for 3 years in garage, works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Owned it for 3 years in garage, works perfect. No issues
customer_reviews.author: B. Ogden

customer_reviews.title: KENMORE 60502 LED Lighting
customer_reviews.text: One of the things I liked in the ad for the Kenmore 60502 was that it had efficient LED lighting in the refrigerator section. Turns out that it was a misprint in the ad. Got a sorry about the inconvenience from SEARS HOLDING COMPANY. Never thought I needed to verify specs on a Sears product.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: Out with the old in with the new.....all went as planned...delivery guys were great...highly reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Pete Rahill

customer_reviews.title: Very nice refridgerator.
customer_reviews.text: Love this refridgerator! Very roomy and cold. My favorite of all the refridgerators that I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: P. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product and the service was great! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: calapooia-one

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect, for our needs. Runs quite, roomy freezer, perfect for a small family. Delivery was fast, delivery people were pleasant and helpful. Ordered on a Sunday, delivered on Wednesday.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B. BINDER

customer_reviews.title: quality medium sized budget fridge
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, well built, performs very well and is colder than needed even on the default settings. My reason for choosing this model is brand name I like for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Freezer is the best i've ever owned. Plenty of room and drawer space.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast and they setup everything. Clean with no dings or scratches. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: InspireMaggie

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: It works and that’s all I need! Plus it has good space
customer_reviews.author: Simplechick

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with it and I am glad that i purchased
customer_reviews.text: I didn't exprect it to be as big as it is. I am in love with it and I am glad that i purchased
customer_reviews.author: Janea

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This frig is a backup...but was surprised at the quality and room...a great purchase. Also the installers were very professional and efficient. All in all, one of my best purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Otto T. Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Great room within the door area. Does what it's supposed too. The only con, is this model should have the deli drawer,.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Enough room for what's needed. Great installation. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: kathlee

customer_reviews.title: Defect
customer_reviews.text: Have to already call for service and had it one week!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to get this refrigerator. It works well and looks nice. I was very happy with the delivery time, the set up and the price I paid for all the service that I received.
customer_reviews.author: 362kiddow

customer_reviews.title: Great product and quality
customer_reviews.text: I am not a person who is well versed in what makes a good refrigerator or not. For the purposes of reviewing this unit I can say that it does what you think a refrigerator should do. It is quiet and I have had no issues with noise or keeping my food frozen/cold. The stainless steel doors are a nice touch but keep in mind the unit outside of the doors is black. Overall I have no complaints about my fridge. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: CuriousConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Freezer doesn't freeze
customer_reviews.text: The freezer doesn't get cold enough for a hard freeze. We have the cold setting at the coldest level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Only thing I would change is like 1 more drawer. But it does what I need it to do!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Happy👍😀
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased and happy with my new refrigerator thank you.
customer_reviews.author: benny wright

customer_reviews.title: Great technicians! Not one problem
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time! Great technicians! Not one problem. This is the way to get appliances!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Freezer worked overtime and looked like it was ready to be defrosted in less than a week. The fridge, never reached an acceptable temperature. I had to throw away all my refrigerated food.
customer_reviews.author: kenny quirk

customer_reviews.title: No icemaker, good fridge
customer_reviews.text: This model does not include an icemaker. Good little fridge. Works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more get a different brand.
customer_reviews.text: Not good missing parts, Freezer gasket leaked. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Goods 4 All

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for garage extra fridge
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and priced fairly. Delivery team amazing! Love my new extra fridge, perfect for large family overflow.
customer_reviews.author: amazed

customer_reviews.title: Stop working.
customer_reviews.text: I got this refrigerator in 2018 and already stop working. I called amazon and the seller did not help me. Bad service. Not happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Using as secondary ref in garage
customer_reviews.text: As expected. Good price. Using as secondary ref in garage. Delivered in perfect shape. Free shipping on very large product was great. Another well known store wanted to charge over 100 just for delivery
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service with delivery and set up of refrigerator. No problems. The guys were professional about their job...
customer_reviews.author: stephenburke

customer_reviews.title: Better than the store
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked! Better than store and hauled away the old one.
customer_reviews.author: FloriBama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit to my kitchen. Works great. I was very impressed by the delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Kenmore 04661219 20.8 cu.ft. Top-Freezer Refrigerator with LED Lighting in Black, includes delivery and hookup
product_meta.description: Size:20.8 cu. ft.| Color:BlackWhen it comes to food storage, nothing comes close to the Kenmore 20. 8-Cubic Feet Top Freezer and Refrigerator. This Kenmore large top freezer refrigerator has 20. 8 cubic feet of interior space, perfect for stocking up on snacks, leftovers, lunches and cans of soda for the home or office. Keep delicious leftovers right next to lunch bags and other groceries, and stash crisp produce in the humidity controlled crisper. Features full-width adjustable glass shelves and 2 clear plastic crisper drawers for fresh and crisp fruits and vegetables. The refrigerator features slide-out glass storage shelves for easy access and removal of pies, cakes, casseroles, and larger food items. With the adjustable shelving, you get near-limitless interior organization options. With the convenient door storage there’s no more trying to puzzle out how to fit food in the fridge. Gallon door bins make it easy to store tall items and beverages alongside your favorite sauces, dressings and other ingredients. Tall item accommodation on the bottom shelf means more space for bottles of wine and water; no more trying to shove things wherever they'll fit. The roomy freezer can hold all of your frozen food neatly. No more digging through a pile of frozen food for a bag of peas. This Kenmore frost-free top freezer helps you keep foods nice and organized with two door bins and a single shelf. The frost-free freezer helps reduce freezer burn on your freezer and the food stored inside it. Features a clean back design that hides the condenser coils, preventing the accumulation of dust and providing you with better refrigerating performance. Kenmore recommends measuring your space to ensure the freezer/refrigerator combo will fit. Freezer does not have an icemaker. DIMENSIONS: 33. 8" x 32. 87" x 66. 1" STORAGE SPACE: 20. 8 cubic feet of interior storage space COLOR: Black.
feature_bullets: FREEZER AND REFRIGERATOR: 20. 8 cubic feet top freezer with refrigerator on bottom. Large freezer for storing frozen items. Icemaker not included
EASY ACCESS SHELVING: Refrigerator features slide-out glass storage shelves for easy access and removal of pies, cakes, casseroles, and larger food items
CONVENIENT STORAGE: Adjustable and easy to remove shelving to customize your storage space. Gallon door bins for taller and wider food or beverage products. 2 clear crisper drawers for produce
BETTER PERFORMANCE: Clean back design hides condenser coils, preventing the accumulation of dust and providing you with better refrigerating performance and less maintenance
ENERGY EFFICIENT: Features interior long-lasting LED lighting. Casts a warm, natural light for easy putting away and removal of food and drinks
DELIVERY INFO: Item includes room of choice delivery, unboxing, item hook-up (including required parts) and free optional haul-away of old appliance at checkout
